articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Preorders Live UK: Argos Back in Stock Today - IGN
articles.description: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders have now started in the UK, with Argos back in stock, and Amazon and Nintendo expected to go live anytime today as well.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Flip 6 and Z Fold 6 One UI 7.0 official changelog - SamMobile
articles.description: Earlier today, Samsung started rolling out the stable One UI 7.0 update to the Galaxy S24 series, Galaxy Z Flip 6, and Galaxy Z Fold 6 in South Korea. Now, the company has also released the much-awaited One UI 7.0 (Android 15) update for the Galaxy Z Fold Spe…

articles.title: Switch 2 GameChat Choppy Frame Rate Explained By Nintendo - Nintendo Life
articles.description: It's about ensuring the "game experience" is at its best

articles.title: Google Releases Android Update to Patch Two Actively Exploited Vulnerabilities - The Hacker News
articles.description: Google patched 62 flaws, including two actively exploited kernel bugs, closing exploit chains used in Android attacks.

articles.title: NASA may consolidate major facilities due to Trump cuts - Politico
articles.description: But the space agency doesn't expect mass layoffs, the acting administrator says.
